Hepsoj's Fecund Fungi.name: Champignons féconds d’Hepsoj
Hepsoj's Fecund Fungi.description:
The caster draws upon and amplifies the ever-present spores of fungi and mold to produce spectacular effects, including choking clouds, ablative armor, restraining bonds, and spontaneous fungus generation.

On a successful casting, the caster may choose to invoke an effect of lesser power than his spell check roll to produce a weaker but potentially more useful result.


Spell Data: @UUID[Compendium.dcc-core-book.dcc-core-spell-journals.JournalEntry.qTV5jIwEfk5F1FNf]{Champignons féconds d’Hepsoj}
